# Review Log

This log records peer‑review activities for documentation changes. Each entry should include the reviewer, date, and a brief summary of the review outcome.

| Date | Reviewer | Change Summary | Approval |
|------|----------|----------------|----------|
| 2025-10-30 | Jane Doe | Added User Manual index and installation guide | ✅ |
| 2025-11-02 | John Smith | Updated style guide to reference ISO 12207 | ✅ |

All documentation updates must be recorded here before merging to `master`.

*Generated by the automated documentation scaffolding tool.*
